main event: A large round object brighter than surrounding stars was sighted low on the horizon for 30 minutes by children.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 24 September 1957,The object appeared white in color and was described as star-like,The observation lasted for 30 minutes at 2010 hours,The position of the object did not match any identifiable astronomy data at the time,The report originates from the Project Blue Book archives which investigated UFO sightings.
witness description: children who first sighted the object
